description: A marine construction project involving the deployment of artificial reefs in the New Richmond area.
duration_in_months: These works will commence after the environmental restriction period which ends on September 15th. The expected completion date is November 15th, 2023.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Development of Multi-species Artificial Reefs**
=============================================================

**Title:** Development of Multi-species Artificial Reefs
--------------------------------------------------------

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Number:** CB-7412-68320591
*   **Amendment Number:** 2
*   **Solicitation Number:** 30004501
*   **Publication Date:** July 20, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** August 10, 2023, 1:00 PM
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 21, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** November 15, 2023

### Tender Overview

The multi-species artificial reef project in the New Richmond area (named site: New Richmond Sud) includes transporting DFO-provided concrete artificial reefs from the Gascons fishing harbor to the work site, placing 160 artificial concrete reefs using suitable floating equipment, and performing pre-replacement seabed work. 

### Solicitation Details

*   **Procurement Category:** CNST
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except NCR)

### Terms and Conditions

*   **Conditionally Set-Aside:** Under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more compliant bids are received from Indigenous businesses.
*   **Post-Work Report:** A comprehensive report detailing the post-work survey must be submitted by the contractor.

### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Agency:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
*   **Contact Name:** Karen Dolan
*   **Email:** DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** (782) 377-7245

### Available Documents

*   Original notice of solicitation
*   Amendment 1
*   Specifications
*   Request for Proposal and information on the supporting documents are available at:  <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/buying-solutions/tenders/30004501.jet> 

### Important Dates

Consult the Tender Documents for details on query submission and schedule. 

You can access all information and contact Karen Dolan by phone at (782) 377-7245 or by email at
